docs.text: Overview 🔗 grpc-web-proxy is a proxy that translates gRPC-Web requests to gRPC requests. You can use it to be able to communicate with gRPC services from the browser. Running 🔗 Using Docker: docker run -it -p 13000 :13000 \ -e GRPC_WEB_PROXY_TARGET_HOST = localhost \ -e GRPC_WEB_PROXY_TARGET_PORT = 12000 \ ghcr.io/kilroybot/grpc-web-proxy And that's it! You can now access your gRPC service from the browser using port 13000.
docs.title: Home
